name: KFH_ThisSummerGameJame
description:
This was made for the This Summer game jam, September 2016. The concept for the game is based on the above ThisSummerBot's twitter post. https://twitter.com/ThisSummerBot/status/772487491...

A two-button platformer of a chick who's parents sold his soul to the devil and he is trying to escape from the demon colonel.

The concept was not fully realized in time for this game jam, but all of the moving piece are there to show off a completely finished little game with beginning, gameplay and ending with music and sound effects (which I often totally forget to add in my prototypes.
